TITLE: Adaptive Testing
DEF: Adjusting the difficulty level of assessment tasks  based on student performance
TASK: The Adaptive Testing pattern supports a form of assessment that modulates question difficulty based on learner performance. It provides an accurate measure of a student's abilities while alleviating test anxiety and frustration, targeting limitations of static assessments. To ensure a more personalized and efficient testing experience, it's crucial to balance challenge and achievability, maintain transparency about the adaptive process, and provide supportive feedback alongside.
